// ro
[
0b111110000111100,
0b110011001100110,
0b110011011000011,
0b111110011000011,
0b110110011000011,
0b110011001100110,
0b110011000111100]

// ta
[
0b1111110011110,
0b0011000111111,
0b0011000110011,
0b0011000110011,
0b0011000111111,
0b0011000110011,
0b0011000110011]

// tr
[
0b1111110111110,
0b0011000110011,
0b0011000110011,
0b0011000111110,
0b0011000110110,
0b0011000110011,
0b0011000110011]

// is
[
0b110011111,
0b110110000,
0b110110000,
0b110011110,
0b110000011,
0b110000011,
0b110111110]

// game
[
0b0011110001111001100011011111,
0b0110000011111101110111011000,
0b1100000011001101111111011000,
0b1100111011001101101011011110,
0b1100011011111101100011011000,
0b0110011011001101100011011000,
0b0011111011001101100011011111]

// over
[
0b00111100011000110111110111110,
0b01100110011000110110000110011,
0b11000011001101100110000110011,
0b11000011001101100111100111110,
0b11000011001101100110000110110,
0b01100110000111000110000110011,
0b00111100000111000111110110011]

// new
[
0b110001101111101100000011,
0b111001101100001100110011,
0b111101101100000110110110,
0b110111101111000110110110,
0b110011101100000111111110,
0b110001101100000011001100,
0b110001101111100011001100]

// zen
[
0b11111101111101100011,
0b00001101100001110011,
0b00011001100001111011,
0b00110001111001101111,
0b01100001100001100111,
0b11000001100001100011,
0b11111101111101100011]

// mode
[
0b110001100011110001111100011111,
0b111011100110011001100110011000,
0b111111101100001101100011011000,
0b110101101100001101100011011110,
0b110001101100001101100011011000,
0b110001100110011001100110011000,
0b110001100011110001111100011111]

// info
[
0b110110001101111100111100,
0b110111001101100001100110,
0b110111101101100011000011,
0b110110111101111011000011,
0b110110011101100011000011,
0b110110001101100001100110,
0b110110001101100000111100]

// top
[
0b111111001111000111110,
0b001100011001100110011,
0b001100110000110110011,
0b001100110000110111110,
0b001100110000110110000,
0b001100011001100110000,
0b001100001111000110000]


// ten
[
0b11111101111101100011,
0b00110001100001110011,
0b00110001100001111011,
0b00110001111001101111,
0b00110001100001100111,
0b00110001100001100011,
0b00110001111101100011]
